clinical_study.official_title: Phase I Clinical Human Tolerability Test of Raltitrexed in Hyperthermic Intraperitoneal Chemotherapy

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the tolerance of patients with colorectal cancer to hyperthermic intraperitoneal chemotherapy with Raltitrexed, to determine the dose limiting toxicity and maximum tolerated dose.
